title: The Younger’s Heart, The Older Never Knows
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>So then, Kanata told Haruka-chan that Kanata will pick her up if she’s going home late, so she should wait at school, but she said that Kanata didn’t have to go that far, and we ended up fighting....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>But Kanata still can’t help but be worried~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby kind of understands what Haruka-chan is saying, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>If Onee-chan said the same thing to me, Ruby probably would’ve thought, “She shouldn’t worry about me, Onee-chan should just go home quickly and rest up”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby is happy that she’s thinking about me, but Ruby doesn’t want to burden her because of it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm, but Kanata doesn’t mind at all, and Dia-chan probably feels the same way too.... Maybe we would feel different if we’re in the little sister’s position.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah, we’re the ones that watch you the closest, so we don’t want you to have a hard time or cause you any trouble.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Is that so.... Thank you, Ruby-chan. Kanata will try talking to Haruka-chan one more time when Kanata gets back home!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufu, if it’s you and Haruka-chan, you two can surely make up♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
